programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull represents Hank Alston, a child recovery agent charged with fraud for not having documented proof of his covert work; Izzy wants Benny to consider hitting back at his opponent in the district attorney race.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Izzy puts her and Bull's upcoming wedding on hold when Bull jeopardizes Benny's election campaign by having TAC handle the corruption trial defense of the former District Attorney whom Benny is running to replace.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull and the TAC team must call upon all of their collective experience to locate Bull's kidnapped daughter; Bull begins to suspect the captor is someone connected to his past.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: A client is on trial for going public with classified government documents; Bull experiences emotional turmoil following his daughter's kidnapping.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: TAC represents a man charged with his high school girlfriend's murder after a documentary depicts him as the prime suspect in the decades-old homicide.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull faces uncertainty in court when TAC handles a class action suit against a vaping company selling malfunctioning devices; Marissa takes the initiative when Bull ignores TAC's growing financial difficulties.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A performer's life is threatened, so Toby poses as her assistant and helps to investigate.

programme.desc: An African teenager, whose father is an alleged war criminal, is abducted.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby's telepathy acts as surveillance when Michelle goes under cover to expose an art-theft ring.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby and Michelle investigate the connection between a cult and three missing young women.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby and Michelle investigate the death of a pharmaceutical executive who released a drug with killer results.

programme.desc: Toby and Michelle must recapture an escaped criminal mastermind before he can seek revenge.

programme.desc: Toby starts doubting his abilities after Michelle questions his insights during their investigation into a wealthy philanthropist's murder.

programme.desc: Toby and the IIB must find the source of a deadly virus before it kills more people.

programme.desc: Violent home invasions are being interrupted by a citizen dressed as a superhero.

programme.desc: Oz puts his life in danger after asking Toby to help an old friend who witnessed a murder.

programme.desc: The team must prove Michelle was set up after a suspect is shot.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Riley are called in to examine a mysterious object that crash-landed in the Nevada desert; Riley uncovers new information about Mac's father but questions whether to deliver it to him after he says he needs to move on.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver gets a shocking surprise when he tries to tell Matty he's quitting the Phoenix Foundation.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Three months after quitting the Phoenix Foundation and moving to Nigeria, Mac puts aside his differences with his father and returns when he hears Jack is the target of a murderous dictator he double-crossed.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Jack receives an emergency distress signal from one of his old Delta buddies who has been accused of terrorism in a foreign country; MacGyver and Jack quickly recruit the rest of Jack's old Delta team and stage an unsanctioned rescue operation.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver and the team go under cover on a college campus to find an operative who is recruiting students to carry out deadly attacks; Jack joins bounty hunter Billy Colton in the hunt for a bail jumper.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver and Riley must find a way to drive a tanker filled with liquid oxygen through a region occupied by rebels and deliver it to a children's hospital; Riley helps MacGyver decide whether or not to allow his father back into his life.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Jack rush to Mexico to help capture the leader of a drug cartel while the country celebrates Dia de Muertos.

programme.desc: Murdoc abducts MacGyver's girlfriend to force Mac to help him rescue his son from a kidnapper; a dangerous person from Murdoc's personal life shows up, giving Mac a glimpse into the villain's past.
